First of its kind in the city of Chennai established in 1951 having 1800 members Premium Club amongst peers located in a prime residential area in South of Chennai Close proximity and seamless connectivity to the Airport, Railway stations, MRTS & Leading Hospitals Affiliations with over 25 reputed clubs across geographical locations in the country. Fully furnished 6 guest rooms equipped with Wi-Fi facility & backed by efficient service. Exquisite Party Halls - fully air-conditioned, near sound proof, fitted with sound systems. Fine Blend of Outdoor & Indoor sporting activities within the premises: Indoor Squash Badminton Table Tennis Cardio room Full fledged Gym with trainers Snooker & Billiards Outdoor Tennis courts Swimming pool Childrenâ€™s play area Dine in services at multiple locations in Restaurant, Deck Cafe, Lawn & Roof Top. Spacious & well laid out BAR stocking sought after brands. Variety entertainment all through the year featuring Movies, Tombola, Bar nights, Karaoke music, Carnatic & Hindustani music amongst other special programs tailored for occasions. Well-stocked Library with books & magazines covering diverse topics for all ages. Patronized by members and guests on a regular basis.
